Registry Editor:
Hide local 'admin'
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon\
SpecialAccounts\UserList\admin
Reduce number of thumbnail previews in taskbar (non-admin)
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Taskband\NumThumbnails

Get-AppxPackage -allusers Microsoft.WindowsStore | Remove-AppxPackage
iex(irm https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/he3als/EdgeRemover@main/get.ps1)

Delete incompatible drivers (Memory Integrity>Core Isolation)
pnputil /delete-driver [driver name].inf

CMD: 
cd "C:\Program Files\Palo Alto Networks\GlobalProtect"
pangps -registerplap

Maintenance--
Defrag / Trim
dfrgui
System File Checker
sfc /scannow
Check Disk
chkdsk /f
Run an online repair
DISM /Online /Cleanup-Image /RestoreHealth
Computer Policy update
gpupdate
Diagnose memory
mdsched
Scan for Akira RW
C:\>dir *akira*.* /s
Clean up
cleanmgr /verylowdisk
Manually add program to startup
shell:startup
Copy in shortcut

Enter sleep state after 5 minutes powershell script
timeout /t 300 /nobreak & RUNDLL32.EXE powrprof.dll,SetSuspendState 0,1,0

Create System Restore Point
wmic.exe /Namespace:\\root\default Path SystemRestore Call CreateRestorePoint "O&O", 100, 7
